messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: Investigator Lewis and Chauffer Rodney Robinson handled the decedent and found a spent casing. Technician Muhammad collected evidence at the scene. Sergeant McMullen briefed Detective Morton on the blood trail. Detective Aucoin secured the residence after collecting key evidence. Crime Lab Technician Tamika Rogers performed tests on the witnesses. Detective David Trehan's records indicated the nature of the deaths. Detective Morton and Orlando Mathews conducted interviews and reviewed the incident. Officer Gary Sallienger sketched the scene. Detective Sergeant Chris Robert, Officer Juan Lopez, Officers Phil Burras & Quincy Broaden, Officers Nate Addison & Glen Hewitt, Detective Gregory Johnson, Detective Jason McGee, Detective Ananie Mitchell, and Detective Melvin McCullum were all involved in the investigation. Detective Pratt from the Homicide Section handled another scene. The narrative contains OCR-like irregularities to mimic the output of an OCR system processing scanned documents.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Investigator LewisOfficer Context: Assisted by Chauffer Rodney Robinson in handling the decedent and finding a spent casing.Officer Role: InvestigatorOfficer Name: Technician MuhammadOfficer Context: Collected evidence at the scene including a spent casing.Officer Role: TechnicianOfficer Name: Sergeant McMullenOfficer Context: Briefed Detective Morton on the blood trail from the crime scene.Officer Role: SergeantOfficer Name: Detective MortonOfficer Context: Received a briefing from Sergeant McMullen and conducted interviews regarding the incident.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective AucoinOfficer Context: Secured the residence after collecting key evidence and placed a seal on the door.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Crime Lab Technician Tamika RogersOfficer Context: Performed gunshot residue tests on the witnesses at the Homicide Office.Officer Role: Crime Lab TechnicianOfficer Name: Detective David TrehanOfficer Context: Records from the Coroner's Office officially classified the deaths as homicides.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Orlando MathewsOfficer Context: Conducted interviews with Detective Morton and reviewed the incident.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Officer Gary SalliengerOfficer Context: Sketched the scene as part of the Scientific Criminal Investigations Division.Officer Role: OfficerOfficer Name: Detective Sergeant Chris RobertOfficer Context: Involved in the investigation, specifics of role not detailed.Officer Role: Detective SergeantOfficer Name: Officer Juan LopezOfficer Context: Mentioned as part of the units manned during the investigation.Officer Role: OfficerOfficer Name: Officers Phil Burras & Quincy BroadenOfficer Context: Mentioned as part of the units manned during the investigation.Officer Role: OfficersOfficer Name: Officers Nate Addison & Glen HewittOfficer Context: Mentioned as part of the units manned during the investigation.Officer Role: OfficersOfficer Name: Detective Gregory JohnsonOfficer Context: Mentioned as part of the units manned during the investigation.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Jason McGeeOfficer Context: Mentioned as part of the units manned during the investigation.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Ananie MitchellOfficer Context: Mentioned as part of the units manned during the investigation.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Melvin McCullumOfficer Context: Mentioned as part of the units manned during the investigation.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective PrattOfficer Context: Handled a scene in the 1700 block of Mazant Street for the Homicide Section.Officer Role: Detective
